import React from 'react' import './CheckOutItem.scss' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {clearItem} from '../../Redux/cart/cart-actions' const CheckOutItem = ({cartItem: {name, imageUrl, price, quantity}}) => (
{name} {quantity} {price}
✕
) const mapDiispatchToProps= dispatch => ({ clearItem: item => dispatch(clearItem(item)) }) export default connect(null,mapDiispatchToProps)(CheckOutItem)
